snippet: The perennial ratings leader on Wednesday was down 34 percent among viewers between the ages of 18 and 49 when compared with last year. Compared with the week before, ratings were down 9 percent.
abstract: The perennial ratings leader on Wednesday was down 34 percent among viewers between the ages of 18 and 49 when compared with last year. Compared with the week before, ratings were down 9 percent.
lead_paragraph: The question of where "American Idol" will finally settle in the ratings this season was not answered Wednesday, as television's one-time powerhouse continued to lose viewers. Even worse, the percentage of viewers it lost, compared with the same night last year, was the biggest so far this season.

headline.main: Ratings for 'American Idol' Take Another Worrisome Dip
